title: Hour 1: Watson Extended Suspension
description:
Stephen A, Kimberley Martin and Chris "Mad Dog" Russo dissect what Deshaun Watson's 11-game suspension and $5 million fine say about the NFL as well as the impact their decision has on the league's brand.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Did the NFL get Deshaun Watson's suspension right?
